name: Mindless Self Indulgence
description: '''Mindless Self Indulgence''' (often referred to as '''MSI''') is an American [[electropunk]] band formed in [[New York City]] in 1997. Their music has a mixed style which includes [[punk rock]], [[alternative rock]], [[electronica]], [[techno]], [[Industrial music|industrial]], [[Hip hop music|hip hop]], and [[breakbeat hardcore]].
